posts.post_content:

[quote name="1880nonsports" post=2215664]I have a nice album that goes with the cards. LMK if you have any interest....[/QUOTE]

Bump- down to just these 4 left for the baseball cards in the set! Who’s got some available?

The Catcher
The Boss Short Stop
Ain’t She a Beauty
Out in Left Field

-The Umpire “Low Ball, Jimmy”
